pages.text: 15|91|Sunawachi kuruān o (kare-ra no tsugō no yoi yō ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo.
15|92|Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou.
15|93|Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te.
15|94|Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yō shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyō to kara tōzakare.
15|95|Hontōni ware wa, chōshō suru mono ni taishi, anata o jūbun ni mamotte yaru.
15|96|Kare-ra wa, arrā ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou.
15|97|Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru.
15|98|Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite,
15|99|sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai.
16|1|Arrā no meirei wa (kanarazu) kuru. Sore o isoide motomete wa naranai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare hakare-ra ga dōtō ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru.

16|2|Kare wa sono shimo be no naka no, o kokoronikanau-sha ni, kare ga meiji rareta keiji o mota sete, tenshi o noko wa sa re (kō ōse rareta). `Ware no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Dakara ware ni anata gata no gimu o hatasu yō kankoku shi nasai.'
16|3|Kare wa shinri ni yotte, ten to ji o sōzō nasa reta nodearu. Kare hakare-ra ga dōtō ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru.
16|4|Kare wa 一精滴 Kara ningen o tsukura reta. Shikashi miruga ī. Kare (ningen) wa kōzen to iron o tonaeru.
16|5|Mata kare wa, kachiku o anata gata (ningen no tame) ni tsukura reta. Anata gata wa, sorera ni yori dan'i ya shuju no ben'eki o e tari, mata sorera o shokuyō to suru.
16|6|Yūgata ni sorera o (ie ni) kari modosu toki, mata asa ni (maki-chi e) karitateru toki, anata gata wa sorera ni yasashisa o kanjiru.
